descriptions: ['DescriptionLuxhabitat is pleased to offer you this 1 bedroom apartment in Paloma, Marina Promenade. The total area is approx 1,036 SQFT. The property has full floor to ceiling windows throughout allowing plenty of natural light and offering great sea views. Open plan kitchen with natural stone countertops and fitted kitchen appliances and a good-sized bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathroom.  Located in one of the much-envied positions of Dubai Marina this beautiful property would make the perfect investment.\nOffering Riviera-style living in a modern aesthetic setting, Dubai Marina by Emaar is one of the first and largest of its kind waterfront developments in the region. \nMarina Promenade consists of six towers that range from 23 to 39 floors and are a mix of one, two and three-bedroom apartments. The towers are connected by a landscaped podium that leads directly to the Marina walkway. The buildings are directly adjacent to the JBR Station 2 of the new Dubai Tram system. Marina Promenade has a fully equipped gymnasium, swimming pools, squash courts, badminton court, library, business lounges, and daycare centre.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive Links are excited to offer to the Dubai Real Estate market, the opportunity to purchase these fantastic 4 bed + maids townhouses in the ninth village of the sought after Victory Heights.
The properties will feature 3 BR (en-suite to master) and a family bathroom on the 1st floor, with a ground floor comprising of a 4th bed, shower room, fitted kitchen with appliances and a living/dining room leading out to the rear garden. Completing the accommodation is a 2nd floor with maids room and laundry.
To the front of the property is a carport offering parking for 2 vehicles.
Located opposite Esmeralda, close to the Al Fay exit, Marbella Village will feature a dedicated community centre with leisure facilities, a supermarket and other retail outlets.
Due for handover in Q4 2020 and offered on attractive payment plans over 5, 7, or 9 years, the properties will offer 2680 sqft of living space, arranged over 3 levels and are currently offered with 0% DLD Fees & Agency Fee.
For more info and to arrange a viewing please contact: Fintan +971561159044 fintan@exclusive-links.com']

['DescriptionThis stunningly spacious two apartment for sale in The Address Sky Views in Downtown has a very huge balcony area that gives you a full view of the downtown community, the Dubai Fountain and the iconic Burj Khalifa.\xa0
This luxury apartment in Downtown is brought to you by Gulf Sotheby’s International Realty, the regional experts in a luxury property. \xa0This luxury apartment is very ideal for a single or small family. This property features a nicely hotel furnished second bedroom and an en-suite master bedroom. The large kitchen and open-plan living and dining areas create a sense of connection and accessibility. This is a highly sought-after property because of its fantastic location just next to Dubai Mall Metro Station.
Address Sky View provides peerless service based on the philosophy that our residents deserve only the finest, and should want for nothing. An immaculately designed lobby greets residents and visitors with charming floral motifs, plush seating areas and an exquisite crystal chandelier with golden touches, an elegant prelude to the refinement that awaits within.
You can also enjoy sundowners at the Pool Lounge, which promises live entertainment every night. The hotel will also be home to a new attraction which will allow you to walk around the skyscraper at an eye-watering 200 meters above the ground. Arguably most exciting is the opening of CÉ LA VI, which is found on the 54th floor of the Address Sky View hotel.
Contact us today to arrange a private viewing of this extraordinary property in The Address Sky Views.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionLocated on a high floor on one of the tallest residential buildings in Dubai - Princess Tower, Dubai Marina.Spacious unit at an affordable price. Apartment has balcony that adds to the living space.The Marina is a great place to live. A self-contained community with everything you need close at hand, including Dubai Marina Mall, Skydive Dubai, JBR beach, lots of supermarkets, restaurants and the Marina Walk.  Many residents make use of the running track that loops around the marina over bridges, and takes in stunning views of the water, luxury yachts and charter boats at any time of the day and night. This is a highlight for walkers, runners and cyclists alike. The Beach at JBR, an open-air mall, is just a short walk away and has an outdoor cinema, cafés, restaurants, salons and boutique shops. The Marina offers a busy social life thanks to the diversity of its community, and it really comes to life at night with busy restaurants and hotels.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionKAYE & CO REAL ESTATE L.L.C. welcomes you to this large and spacious 1 bedroom located in the prestigious Burj Khalifa Tower.Property Details:\xa01 Bedroom with 1,096 sqftOverlooking Opera District and sea viewsUnfurnished & Readily Vacant1 Bathroom plus Powder RoomLarge Walk-in Closet in the bedroomNice breakfast bar in the kitchenWine Cooler in Living RoomType 1J - based in zone 3 - Mid FloorsAED 1,799,900Building Amenities:\xa0Indoor link to Dubai MallSky lounge for residents (123rd floor)24/7 ConciergeTennis Court x 2 plus Basketball on SaturdaysGym + Swimming Pool x 2Business Center on 43rd FloorMeeting Rooms on 43rd and 76th FloorZoom Supermarket on Ground Floor6 Armani Restaurants with 15% discount for residentsHousekeeping, carwash and laundry available as a service\xa0Please feel free to contact Eugen at +971504200350 for any additional information.\xa0Burj Khalifa is truly a mixed-use tower, comprises 1.85 million square feet of residential space, and 300,000 square feet of office space, in addition to the Armani Hotel Dubai and Armani Residences. It also features lounges, health and wellness facilities, four pools and two observation decks.\xa0KAYE & CO. is a privately-run real estate firm with more than fifteen years of local industry experience. We are a Burj Khalifa tower focused agency and if you are looking for somebody that can guide you through the tower with few different layouts and views - please contact me to book your site visit today.']
